Producer: Erik Hemmendorff, Marie Kjellson, Philippe Bober
Production Co: Auvergne Rhône-Alpes Cinéma, Motlys, Plattform Produktion AB, Coproduction Office ApS, Parisienne , Film i Väst
Synopsis: A man's selfish reaction to the danger posed by an avalanche causes cracks in his marriage and relationships with his children.
Title: Force majeure
